system.description: When taking this talent Character selects either Ranged or Melee to represent "X" (affects requirements appropriately). Character imposes penalty of -10 x Degrees of Success on Evasion Tests when making listed actions. Melee: All Out Attack, Charge Attack, Melee Called Shot, Melee Standard Attack, or Stun Action. Ranged: Ranged Called Shot, Ranged Standard Attack. Has no effect on weapons with the Spray Quality.
